dcterms:creator: Stefan Hinterstoisser
Vincent Lepetit
Slobodan Ilic
Stefan Holzer
Gary Bradski
Kurt Konolige

dcterms:description: Linemod consists of 13 sequences of real images with ground truth poses for a single object with background clutter and mild occlusion. Each sequence contains around 1,200 images.
dcterms:title: Linemod

dcterms:creator: Eric Brachmann
Alexander Krull
Frank Michel
Stefan Gumhold
Jamie Shotton
Carsten Rother
dcterms:description: Linemod-Occlusion consists of 1,214 images from a sequence of Linemod, where ground truth poses of eight objects with partial occlusion are annotated for testing.
dcterms:title: Linemod-Occlusion

dcterms:creator: Yu Xiang
Tanner Schmidt
Venkatraman Narayanan
Dieter Fox
dcterms:description: YCB-V is composed of more than 110,000 real images of 21 objects with severe occlusion and clutter. It includes both real training images and physically-based rendered data.
dcterms:title: YCB-V
